meanings.definition: Trinitrotoluenes: a group of explosive compounds commonly used in military applications.
meanings.sent1: The soldiers carefully handled the trinitrotoluenes during the training exercise.
meanings.sent2: The trinitrotoluenes were stored in a secure facility to ensure safety.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the trinitrotoluenes for acorns and caused quite a commotion!
meanings.sent4: Her words were like trinitrotoluenes, explosive and impactful.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the trinitrotoluenes made them stand out in the storage room.
